category: Accounting Regulations/Article 18 (Omission of accounting statements due to computerization)
contents: Article 18 (Omission of accounting records due to computerization) ① Due to the computerization of accounting work, the provision of records, etc. in accordance with this regulation may be omitted. ② Even if the provision of records is omitted in accordance with the provisions of paragraph 1, supervision shall be carried out. If there is a request from an institution or an interested party, necessary measures must be taken to promptly provide a substitute ledger with the same contents as the accounting ledger. In such cases, the Chairman of the Board of Directors shall decide separately.
